question: Who was Zul karnain? and Who's ummat was he in?

Zul Karnain was a king who travelled extensively around the world and he put
up the wall to prevent the dangerous people- Yajuj and Majuj , from crossing
as they used to abuse the people. (Surah Kahf) We are not aware of the time
and era of Zul Karnain.

And Allah Ta'ala knows best
